* I Want To

### What would you like to do?

* #### REPORT AN ISSUE

  + [File a Claim against the City](https://live.origamirisk.com/Origami/IncidentEntry/Direct?token=bcf55mNyh%2BjH8j4YqBAzP1EwZiTCCcgcTg6NSJ%2BRcyucKKb%2BehxYl6VYrhthxRh5lmJENrqHpxpjAOrVqq4rvFAcHggMJsJtgiltXEdW6HZY80OkE398Otbl2VQzPis6)
  + [Submit a Report / Service Requests](https://ci.lubbock.tx.us/departments/311-citizens-request/submit-a-report)
  + [Report a Code Violation](https://seeclickfix.com/oauth/login)
* #### SUBMIT AN APPLICATION

  + [Apply for Building Inspections & Permits](https://ci.lubbock.tx.us/departments/building-safety)
  + [Apply for a Job](https://www.governmentjobs.com/careers/lubbock)
  + [Submit a Contracting or Bid Proposal](https://ci-lubbock-tx.bonfirehub.com/portal/?tab=openOpportunities)
  + [Become a City Vendor](https://ci.lubbock.tx.us/departments/purchasing-contract-management/vendor-information)
* #### REQUEST A DOCUMENT OR SERVICE

  + [Request a Birth or Death Certificate](https://ci.lubbock.tx.us/birthanddeath)
  + [Submit an Open Records Request](https://lubbocktx.govqa.us/WEBAPP/_rs/SupportHome.aspx)
  + [Hotel Occupancy Tax Form](https://ci.lubbock.tx.us/storage/images/IY2xH6tyNIYfL5yHYIIPvLZQPQnVJ4nhihbChNwz.xlsx)
* #### RECEIVE EMERGENCY NOTIFICATIONS

  + [Sign up for LBKAlert](https://ci.lubbock.tx.us/pages/sign-up-for-lbkalert)
* #### VIEW HELPFUL LINKS

  + [Election Results](https://ci.lubbock.tx.us/election-results)
  + [Lubbock Metropolitan Planning Organization](https://ci.lubbock.tx.us/pages/lubbock-metropolitan-planning-organization)
  + [Visit Lubbock](http://www.visitlubbock.org/)
  + [Lubbock Chamber of Commerce](http://www.lubbockchamber.com/)
  + [L.E.D.A](http://lubbockeda.org/)
  + [Veterans Advisory Committee](https://ci.lubbock.tx.us/pages/veterans-advisory-committee)
  + [Downtown LBK](https://downtownlbk.us/)
  + [Civic Lubbock, Inc.](http://www.civiclubbock.com/index.html)
  + [How to Start a New Business](https://ci.lubbock.tx.us/storage/images/fN81bawXxwLggNHdP1XEEwQ7Jc2nbykn9FMHkzLq.pdf)
  + [Citibus](http://www.citibus.com/)
  + [Public Building Information Search](https://egovaccess.ci.lubbock.tx.us/EnerGov_Prod/SelfService/#/search)
* #### ASK A QUESTION

  + [Contact the City](https://ci.lubbock.tx.us/pages/contact-the-city)
  + [View our FAQs](https://ci.lubbock.tx.us/departments/311-citizens-request/faqs)
